00003 #include "ORAD3511ADCDecoder.hh"
00004 #include "ORLogger.hh"
00005 #include "ORUtils.hh"

00007 void ORAD3511ADCDecoder::Swap(UInt_t* record)
00008 {
00009   ORUtils::Swap(record[1]); 
00010   /* Swap so we can tell if this has a timestamp.*/
00011   size_t startSwapFrom = 2;
00012   if (HasReferenceDate(record)) {
00013     ORUtils::Swap(record[2]);
00014     ORUtils::Swap(record[3]);
00015     UInt_t dummy = record[2];
00016     record[2] = record[3];
00017     record[3] = dummy;
00018     startSwapFrom = 4;
00019   }
00020   for (size_t i=startSwapFrom;i<LengthOf(record);i++) {
00021     ORUtils::Swap(record[i]);
00022   }
00023 }
00024 
00025 double ORAD3511ADCDecoder::ReferenceDateOf(UInt_t* record)
00026 { 
00027   if(!HasReferenceDate(record)) return 0.0;
00028 
00029   double refDate = (*((double*)(record+2)));
00030   return refDate;
00031 }

00033 
00034 std::string ORAD3511ADCDecoder::GetHistName(int iHist)
00035 {
00036   int iCard = iHist % kNCards;
00037   int iCrate = (iHist - iCard) / kNCards;
00038 
00039   return ::Form("hAD3511_%d_%d", iCrate, iCard);
00040 }
00041 
00042 std::string ORAD3511ADCDecoder::GetHistTitle(int iHist)
00043 {
00044   int iCard = iHist % kNCards;
00045   int iCrate = (iHist - iCard) / kNCards;
00046 
00047   return ::Form("AD3511: Crate %d, Card %d", iCrate, iCard);
00048 }
00049 
00050 int ORAD3511ADCDecoder::GetHistIndex(UInt_t* record)
00051 {
00052   return CardOf(record) + kNCards*CrateOf(record);
00053 }
00054 
00055 std::string ORAD3511ADCDecoder::GetParName(size_t iPar)
00056 {
00057   switch(iPar) {
00058     case 0: return "crate";
00059     case 1: return "card";
00060     case 2: return "adc";
00061     default:
00062       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetParName(): index (" << iPar
00063                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00064       return "unknown";
00065   }
00066 }
00067 
00068 UInt_t ORAD3511ADCDecoder::GetPar(UInt_t* record, size_t iPar, size_t iRow)
00069 {
00070   switch(iPar) {
00071     case 0: return CrateOf(record);
00072     case 1: return CardOf(record);
00073     case 2: return IthADCValueOf(record, iRow);
00074     default:
00075       ORLog(kWarning) << "GetPar(): index (" << iPar
00076                       << ") out of range." << std::endl;
00077       return 0;
00078   }
00079 }
